item.source: Issue with hooking the MyPlayer field

item.title: Issue with hooking the MyPlayer field
item.dc:creator: @Discarded Discarded
item.description:
@Discarded wrote:

It injects the getMyPlayer() hook, which should return ci.k, but it returns client.k…

[code]package org.rsbc.transformers;

import org.objectweb.asm.tree.FieldNode;

import com.rshacking.rhf.files.ClassContainer;
import com.rshacking.rhf.updater.Transform;
import com.rshacking.rhf.updater.hooks.ClassHook;
import com.rshacking.rhf.updater.hooks.HooksList;

public class MyPlayer extends Transform {

@Override
public boolean canActivate(HooksList hooks, ClassContainer cc) {
	return cc.containsField("L" + hooks.get("Player").getOrigName() + ";", true);
}

@Override
public boolean execute(HooksList hooks, ClassContainer cc) {
	System.out.println("MyPlayer class: "+cc.getName());
	ClassHook client = null;
	if (hooks.contains("Client"))
		client = hooks.get("Client");
	else
		client = hooks.add("Client", "client");
	for (FieldNode field : cc.getASM().fields)
		if (field.desc.equals("L" + hooks.get("Player").getOrigName() + ";"))
			client.add("MyPlayer", field);
	return true;
}

@Override
public String getNewName() {
	return null;
}

@Override
public String getOldName() {
	return null;
}

@Override
public void setNewName(String arg0) {

}

@Override
public void setOldName(String arg0) {

}

}
[/code]

it currently does this

public dg getMyPlayer() { return k; }
but i need it to do this

public dg getMyPlayer() { return ci.k; }

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with hooking the MyPlayer field
